*Resilience*

*Category: ecological/ecosystem*

See Species goal for calculations.

This value reflects the average condition of species (based on risk status from the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species, [http://www.iucnredlist.org/](http://www.iucnredlist.org/)) [@iucn2022] located within the eez of each region based on species range maps from IUCN (shapefiles, used preferentially) [@iucn_spatial_2022; @birdlifeinternationalandhandbookofthebirdsoftheworld2020] and Aquamaps ([http://www.aquamaps.org/](http://www.aquamaps.org/), half degree resolution rasters).
